welcome_message_body: Welcome to Blainville, Canada, where you'll find the perfect blend of small-town charm and modern amenities. Known for its beautiful parks and vibrant community, we invite you to explore and enjoy everything our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mirabel Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at St Hubert Airport serves flights to smaller cities within Canada.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
